cms_block.title: Banner About us full width
cms_block.content: About us

cms_block.title: Extend Block Contents
cms_block.content:
TEXT DETAIL ONE

ADescription - Road Bikes 27.5 Alloy 24 Speed MTB features a lightweight hydroformed 6061 alloy frame with a smooth weld tube, complemented by an XCT-V4 alloy crown suspension with lock out and a 24 speed Shimano drivetrain for a super smooth ride and shifting. The Supra 27.5 doesn't stop at that, as it also features a 36 hole alloy double wall rim, with eyelets and black stainless steel spokes, as well as front and rear Tektro Draco disc brakes. The Bauer Supra 27.5 Alloy 24 Speed MTB is available in two tone white and black and is designed to let you ride on and off the trail in total style and comfort.

TEXT DETAIL TWO

ADescription - Road Bikes 27.5 Alloy 24 Speed MTB features a lightweight hydroformed 6061 alloy frame with a smooth weld tube, complemented by an XCT-V4 alloy crown suspension with lock out and a 24 speed Shimano drivetrain for a super smooth ride and shifting. The Supra 27.5 doesn't stop at that, as it also features a 36 hole alloy double wall rim, with eyelets and black stainless steel spokes, as well as front and rear Tektro Draco disc brakes. The Bauer Supra 27.5 Alloy 24 Speed MTB is available in two tone white and black and is designed to let you ride on and off the trail in total style and comfort.
